about_the_game:
『Second Works』 is a 2D platform action-adventure game set in a sci-fi fantasy world based on biotechnology. Players explore a vast world filled with diverse environments such as giant laboratories, toxic forests, and ancient cities, uncovering the secrets of a chaotic world. Enjoy the unique atmosphere created by colorful anime-style graphics and the thrilling experience of high-difficulty action.

Story

The new research project 'Second Works', which was supposed to bring hope, has created the energies of 'Order' and 'Chaos' that now envelop the world, and a new life form called the 'Fusion' through the fusion experiments. Humanity, having acquired great power, seemed to be on the brink of realizing a peaceful and higher-order world balanced between Order and Chaos. However, the energy of Chaos went out of control, and the world descended into madness due to mutated humans, remaining unchanged for many years. Now, with the awakening of a newly created Fusion girl named 'Zero', something is about to change.........

Game Features

Players explore a vast map, engage in conversations with various characters, and collect items while challenging numerous stages scattered across the world. Throughout their journey, they will face impenetrable barriers and powerful bosses. As they explore, they will unlock "Souls" that grant additional effects, "Elixirs" usable within stages, and unique playable characters, broadening their strategic options. Experience the satisfaction of overcoming trials and breaking through with your own hands.
